Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In contrast to nifedipine , CD - 832 ( 10 micrograms / kg / min ) prevented the decrease in percentage segmental shortening from 32 + / - 12 % to 115 + / - 26 % of the control value ( P < . 01 ) and ST - segment elevation from 5 . 6 + / - 1 . 0 mV to 1 . 6 + / - 1 . 3 mV ( P < . 01 ) at 3 min after ISO infusion with stenosis .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| ISO |

Explanation:

In this paragraph, the "Disease" entities refer to medical conditions or abnormalities. The only disease mentioned in the text is "ISO", which is short for isoproterenol, a medication that can cause symptoms similar to those of a heart attack when given in high doses.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

| --- |
| ISO |

Explanation:

In this paragraph, the only disease mentioned is "ISO", which is short for isoproterenol. While "stenosis" refers to a narrowing or constriction of a blood vessel or other tubular organ, it is not a disease itself but rather a symptom or manifestation of an underlying disease. Therefore, it is not included in the table.
